# install

::: {#cca0dcf8 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!pip install uv
```
:::


# create project

::: {#d19570c6 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv init project
```
:::

``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv python list --only-installed
```

# chose python version

::: {#9dd45872 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv python pin 3.13
```
:::


# install pacakge

::: {#d2e04a4a .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv add siuba
```
:::


# show pacakge

::: {#72eef501 .cell execution_count=6}


# delete pacakge

::: {#8a935fa5 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv remove rich
```
:::


# using uv with script header

## there is no rich package in python

::: {#1cca5f1b .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
try:
    import rich
    print('pacakge installed')
except ImportError as e:
    print('pacakge not installed')
    pass  # module doesn't exist, deal with it.
```
:::


## but can add rich package in script

```{.python file.name='test.py'}
#| eval: false

# /// script
# requires-python = ">=3.12"
# dependencies = [
#   "requests<3",
#   "rich",
# ]
# ///

import requests
import rich
from rich.pretty import pprint


import rich
from importlib.metadata import version

print('test.py is running')
print('version is :')
print(version('rich'))


```

## run .py with uv

::: {#fdc9bd54 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
!uv run test.py
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
test.py is running
version is :
13.9.4
```
:::
:::
